EmailTemplate.subject: Updated NCR Account Executive Contact List
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear Owner Operators and OTP’s: The NCR McDonald’s Account Team would like to provide you with an updated NCR Account Executive List. Please see the chart below. <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
